name: Candy Ball Shoot
description:
Candy Ball Shoot is the must played bubble shooter. Make combinations of 3 or more bubbles to make them dissapear and score points. The more bubbles you shoot at once the more points you get.

How to Play:
- Drag your finger
- Lift your finger to take a shot.
- Match 3 bubbles or more of the same color to pop the combo and win points.
- Hit and pop all the colored balls to clear levels.



FEATURES
- 100+ Levels of Challenging Puzzles
- Multiple combinations skills support you to solve the puzzles
- Use powerful boosters to clean the blocks on your adventures
- Exquisite graphics and vivid animations
- Easy to play but hard to be a master
